items.text: I'd use one of these solutions:
items.href: Crop a fixed size image in Android - Stack Overflow

items.text:
EDIT:
I have introduced a few changes to android-crop and now you can use withFixedSize(int width, int height) to set fixed cropping area in pixels.
items.href: Crop a fixed size image in Android - Stack Overflow

items.text: Check full code at my github https://github.com/mklimek/android-crop/tree/newfeature_fied_size_crop.
items.href: Crop a fixed size image in Android - Stack Overflow
